912.question: what metrics are used in evaluation?
912.response: {'Answer': 'F1 score and standard deviation (F1±std), and language model (LM) perplexity for both forward (Fwd) and backward (Bwd) language models.'}

914.question: what previous systems were compared to?
914.response: {'Answer': 'The systems compared to were models from Yang et al. (2017), Chiu and Nichols (2016), Collobert et al. (2011), Luo et al. (2015), Lample et al. (2016), Ma and Hovy (2016), Hashimoto et al. (2016), and Søgaard and Goldberg (2016).'}
914.answer: Chiu and Nichols (2016), Lample et al. (2016), Ma and Hovy (2016), Yang et al. (2017), Hashimoto et al. (2016), Søgaard and Goldberg (2016)
